attributes.action: require that all jobseekers are referred to their local volunteer bureau as a condition of recieving benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We accept that JSA has an important role when people are genuinely seeking work. However, it is scandalous that people are paid not to work when so much needs doing in the community. Those who genuinely want work will appreciate the experience and references.
